title: mfers
description: mfers are generated entirely from hand drawings by sartoshi. this project is in the public domain; feel free to use mfers any way you want.

title: CREYZIES
description: CREYZIES are generated entirely from hand drawings by Reylarsdam. They are the official companion collection to mfers. This project is in the public domain; feel free to use CREYZIES any way you want.

title: mfers next era
description: mfers next era is a membership dao that funds projects in china proliferating the mfers meme

title: mfers ahead
description: a small collection of 420 forward-looking mfers. handdrawn by @metabananas. derivative inspired by sartoshi and the mfers community.

title: about mfers
description: the story of mfers • rarity guides • community contributions

title: mfer x wavelength
description: collaborative pieces by kaleb and sartoshi inspired by their projects, wavelength and mfers

title: the mfer times
description: substack newsletter on all things mfers by kml

title: mfers doin stuff - standing
description: Posture is everything. Mfers traditionally do what they do best, sitting down being absolutely great. But sometimes even mfers need to stand up and acutally do stuff.
